comment: Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite
constructorsignature: Function New(outputLoc As String) As TestSuiteReport
commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
commenthtml: Class for the HTML report for a TestSuite

methods.label: New
methods.signature: Function New(outputLoc As String) As TestSuiteReport

arguments.label: outputLoc
arguments.comment: Directory to write the HTML or XML report to
arguments.commentblock: &lt;div class=&quot;description&quot;&gt;	&lt;ul class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;		&lt;li class=&quot;blockList&quot;&gt;			&lt;div class=&quot;comments&quot;&gt;&lt;!-- comment --&gt;&lt;pre&gt;Directory to write the HTML or XML report to&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;			&lt;hr /&gt;		&lt;/li&gt;	&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
arguments.commenthtml: Directory to write the HTML or XML report to

methods.label: printoutReport
methods.comment: Write out the actual HTML report
methods.codesample:
Sub completeReport()
    
    Dim testSuite as New TestSuiteReport(Me.outputLoc)
    Call testSuite.printoutReport(Me)
    
End Sub
methods.commenthtml: Write out the actual HTML report
methods.codesamplehtml: Sub completeReport()&lt;br /&gt;    &lt;br /&gt;    Dim testSuite as New TestSuiteReport(Me.outputLoc)&lt;br /&gt;    Call testSuite.printoutReport(Me)&lt;br /&gt;    &lt;br /&gt;End Sub
